akn:section.akn:heading: Penalty for solicitation of murder or other crime of violence.

akn:content.akn:p: Whoever is guilty of soliciting a murder, whether or not such murder occurs, shall be sentenced to a period of imprisonment not exceeding 20 years, a fine not more than the amount set forth in ยง 22-3571.01, or both.

Whoever is guilty of soliciting a crime of violence as defined by ยง 23-1331(4), whether or not such crime occurs, shall be sentenced to a period of imprisonment not exceeding 10 years, a fine of not more than the amount set forth in ยง 22-3571.01, or both.
